Data Downloads

Download the complete datasets used in this analysis

How to Use This Data

The datasets below contain the complete analysis data for the 2020 San Francisco subcontract market. Each file is in CSV format and can be opened in Excel, Google Sheets, or any data analysis tool.

Note for Full Deployment

To replace the sample data with full datasets, copy your CSV files to the public/data/ directory and ensure the filenames match exactly. The dashboard will automatically load the full data on next visit.

Data Sources

  • • San Francisco Public Works contracts (2020)
  • • LBE certification records
  • • Subcontractor award data

Analysis Methods

  • • Herfindahl-Hirschman Index (HHI)
  • • Market share calculations
  • • Scope consolidation mapping

market_concentration_hhi_consolidated.csv

12.5 KB•143 records

Market concentration analysis with HHI scores for each scope of work

dominant_subcontractors_consolidated.csv

18.2 KB•162 records

Subcontractors with significant market share in their respective scopes

lbe_scope_analysis.csv

25.1 KB•259 records

Local Business Enterprise participation analysis by scope

scope_subcontractor_aggregation_consolidated.csv

32.4 KB•385 records

Detailed scope and subcontractor relationship data

Data Dictionary

Market Concentration Fields

FieldDescription
ScopeOfWorkConsolidated scope of work category
ScopeHHIHerfindahl-Hirschman Index score
ConcentrationLevelHigh/Moderate/Unconcentrated classification

LBE Analysis Fields

FieldDescription
LBE_CountNumber of LBE firms in scope
LBE_Dollar_SharePercentage of scope dollars awarded to LBEs
LBE_RatePercentage of subcontractors that are LBEs
